Message.Name: Reserved
Message.Description: Reserved.

Message.Name: Exact Match
Message.Description: Street address and zip code match.

Message.Name: Partial Match
Message.Description: Street address or zip code does not match.

Message.Name: AVS Unavailable
Message.Description: Address information is unavailable or the Issuer does not support AVS.

Message.Name: Error
Message.Description: AVS not performed due to an error or insufficient data.

Message.Name: No Match
Message.Description: Neither address nor zip code match.

Message.Name: Authorization Entity
Message.Description: Response provided by Intermediate processor.

Message.Name: Authorization Entity
Message.Description: Response provided by issuer processor.
CSC and Address Match.
Full Data Match.
CSC Match.
Data Not Checked.
All Data Match.
CSC and Postcode Match.
Partial match: address matches but postal code does not.
Neither address nor postal code match.
Error: Retry - system unable to process.
AVS currently unavailable.
No data from issuer authorization system.
CSC and postal code match.
For U.S. addresses, nine-digit postal code matches, address does not. For addresses outside U.S., postal code matches, address does not match.
For U.S. addresses only: five-digit postal code and address match.
For U.S. addresses only: five-digit postal code matches, address does not match.
Address information matches but postal code does not match.
Street address matches, but postal code not verified. Returned for non U.S.-issued Visa card only.
Street address and postal code do not match. Returned for non U.S.-issued Visa cards only.
The match is exact: both the address and the postal codes match. No representment rights.
AVS data is invalid or AVS is not allowed for this card type.
Address information is unavailable, or the issuer does not support AVS. Acquirer has representment rights.
Address information is unavailable, or the issuer does not support AVS. Acquirer has representment rights.
The match is not exact, either because the postcode and/or the addresses do not match.
The match is exact: both the address and the postcodes match. No representment rights.
Postal code matches, but street address not verified. Returned for non U.S.-issued Visa cards only.
System unavailable.
U.S. issuing bank does not support AVS.
Address information unavailable. Returned if the U.S. bank does not support non-U.S. AVS or if the AVS in a U.S. bank is not functioning properly.
Street address does not match, but 9-digit postal code matches.
Street address and 9-digit postal code match.
Street address and 5-digit postal code match.
Postal code information matches but address information does not match.
